name: Architect Of Terror
description:
A small entry made for the Ludum Dare Jam #33 "You Are The Monster". This is my second Ludum Dare and my first game made with Unity.


This game deals with racist and inhuman totalitarian dictatorships. Note that even if it is of course made with a view to criticizing these dictatorships, this game might offend some people and is not advised for children.

Commands:

  • Left/Right/Up/Down (or XBox controller directional pad).
  • Esc to quit (without confirmation).

A web version of the game is available. The Mac and Linux builds are totally untested.


Font Weekend Warrior at the game start made by David Kerkhoff.
